author: Fitzherbert, John, d. 1531.
Fitzherbert, Anthony, Sir, 1470-1538, attributed name.
publisher: In fletestrete in the house of Thomas Berthelet, nere to the condite at the sygne of Lucrece,
notes: ".. compyled sometyme by mayster Fitz herbarde .." (N2v), i.e. John Fitzherbert. Sometimes also attributed to Sir Anthony Fitzherbert.
Printer's name and address from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
This edition has woodcut title-page border McKerrow & Ferguson 30, with "1534" in sill.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
